name: Keep The Party Going
description:
Rahka is invited by his friend, Sandy, to let loose a little bit and come with her to visit a rave that's going down in an abandoned warehouse in their city.

He might let loose way too much. You can't get a grip on yourself when you've ended up far too free to ever go back...

------------------------------------

This... holy goddamn, this is a big one. I had a [i]blast[/i] writing this, as you might be able to tell when you read it. There's a lot in here if you're a fan of hypnosis, corruption, and personality alteration. I think this CYOA really let me stretch my wings out and try out some new systems with the formula as well.
I couldn't have done this without :iconrahka: giving me a bunch of pictures to help inspire me, and in general having some really awesome ideas to work off of. Seriously, I think this one is a fuckin' treat.

Rahka belongs to :iconrahka:.
